description: This file implements the state access functions and property management for the CCSP CWMP TCP Connection Request Handler object in C. It provides functions to get/set internal object references, retrieve and configure properties, reset session info, and handle object state resets. The functions facilitate managing the handler's internal state, configuration, and session management.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE CcspCwmpTcpcrhoGetCcspCwmpCpeController(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Retrieves the object state for the CPE Controller handle stored in the handler object.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CcspCwmpTcpcrhoSetCcspCwmpCpeController(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hCcspCwmpCpeController)
methods.description: Sets the CPE Controller handle in the handler object.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE CcspCwmpTcpcrhoGetWebAcmIf(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Retrieves the Web Access Control Interface handle.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CcspCwmpTcpcrhoSetWebAcmIf(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hWebAcmIf)
methods.description: Sets the Web Access Control Interface handle.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CcspCwmpTcpcrhoGetProperty(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hProperty)
methods.description: Retrieves the property data structure of the handler object.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CcspCwmpTcpcrhoSetProperty(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hProperty)
methods.description: Copies the provided property data into the handler's property.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CcspCwmpTcpcrhoResetProperty(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Resets the handler's property to default values, including host address, port, mode, session timeout, and authentication settings.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CcspCwmpTcpcrhoReset(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Resets session-specific information such as last access time, magic ID (session ID), and zeroes out the authentication session info.

search-terms: CCSP CWMP TCP Connection Request Handler
